name: homebridge-tuya-petfeeder-f14w
description: Il dispenser di crocchette di cui il tuo gatto non aveva bisogno: Implementazione base di un dispenser F14W basato su App Tuya Smart Life. | The kibble dispenser your cat didn't need: Basic implementation of an F14W dispenser based on Tuya Smart Life App. Features: Single feed control, Multiple feed with configurable portions (1-10) and wait time between portions (5-30s), Multi-language support (IT/EN).
author: ciapamusche
